attributes.action: stop online learning as it doesn't work not everyone has access to it
attributes.additional_details: So that we have an education and get the most we can from it and not make us learn online as it doesn't work and for employers to give us the same chances as someone who didnt go to college during covid-19
attributes.background: To stop it and wait till we are back in college because we dont learn and extend the academic year so we have more time to pass everything
